name: Slime Invasion!
description:
Watch out!

The caves are flooded with slimes and you got caught between them! With no way to run or fight, you must dodge the slimes, but they just keep coming!

In this rhythmic skill game, you'll need to learn how each slime behaves and counter accordingly. Each color of slimes has a different pattern and timing. You'll need to think fast and act precisely.

Controls:
Z - Jump
C - Crouch
F - Fullscreen
R - Restart
ESC - Pause

Slime list:

Red Slime - These pesky critters will charge you nonstop from one side to the other. At least you can jump and they can't.
Blue Slime - The blue slimes bounce through the caves. You better crouch when you see one!
Yellow Slime - A bit smarter than their red cousins, they'll take a good look at you before charging. Watch their timing!
Green Slime - Less bouncy, but trickier, they will stop for a bit before jumping at you, don't be a fool! Pay attention to the other slimes and crouch at the right time.
Multicolor Slime - If you don't know which color the slime is, then pay attention to their movements; if they do a little hop, they'll jump, if they don't, they'll charge. Be ready for it!
